Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23639 affecting package rust for versions less than crossbeam_utils-0.8.7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-23639 affecting package rust for versions less than crossbeam_utils-0.8.7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rust is earlier than crossbeam_utils-0.8.7, affected by CVE-2022-23639
